newsitem.title: USA: Capitol Transamerica Corp Q4 net falls.
newsitem.headline: Capitol Transamerica Corp Q4 net falls.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
(All data above 000s except per share numbers)

NOTE: Q4 1996 net income included after-tax realized investment gains of $3.9 million, or $0.35 a share, compared with $1.8 million, or $0.16 a share, for the fourth quarter of 1995. During the fourth quarter of 1996 the company increased incurred but not reported claim reserves by $5.1 million, which resulted in an after-tax decrease of $0.30 per share.

Net income for all of 1996 included after-tax realized investment gains of $5.6 million, or $0.50 a share, compared with $2.4 million, or $0.21 a share, in 1995. Excluding after-tax realized investment gains, net income for 1996 was $12.7 million, or $1.15 a share, compared with $11.6 million, or $1.05 a share in 1995.
